text: The women's 200 metres event at the 2000 World Junior Championships in Athletics was held in Santiago, Chile, at Estadio Nacional Julio Martínez Prádanos on 19, 20 and 21 October. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Veronica Campbell ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Sina Schielke ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Vida Anim ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 21 October Wind: +0.7m/s {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
